Feral/Botan:




Feral walked down the long corridor with the two large robots at his sides, 
all three of them Maximals, though now they called themselves Transorganics.  
All had donned a beast mode after hearing about the righteous path of the 
Beast Warriors.

A green six-foot robot approached Feral, saluting.
"Feral, glad your here.  We're having some problems with the equipment."

"Hmmm?"

"The spore chambers' energy readings are fluxuating, and the organic fluid 
chambers are unstable."

"What?  How'd you foul that up?" Feral yelled, running for the spore chamber.

"I did--" a loud boom and a shockwave in the ground sent everyone crashing 
down.

"What w--" a second explosion of equal preportions continued rocking the four 
robots.

A wall blew open, millions of spores shooting out, miraculously missing Botan 
and Feral.  But both saw the spores beginning to take effect on the two 
bodyguards, a small stream of green fluid heading for them.

"Get out of here!" Feral yelled as he and Botan ran, the fluid engulfing the 
bodyguards and several other robots who were screaming turning into strange 
creatures from the effects of the spores.
